website_summaries.verdict: Recipes are both low-carb and low-effort, ideal for those with busy lifestyles.
pros: Recipes are easy to follow even for novice cooks
Covers low-carb, keto, and paleo diets
All recipes use a slow cooker – ideal for busy people
Ample amounts of helpful tips and nutritional information alongside the recipes
cons: Photos may be high-quality but there aren't very many of them

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This book is wonderful. Delicious recipes. Almost gourmet, but no weird ingredients or difficult prep My husband tells me, "this can't be low carb". But it is. I make a work weeks worth of dinners on the weekend, then come home to delicious meals every night. Highly recommend to anyone doing low carb or keto
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I don't like to cook. I want to throw some stuff into the crockpot, come back later, and eat. This book is not for me. Like most cookbooks, it calls for lots of 'foodie' ingredients that I don't have and many I have never heard of. The recipes involve long lists of odd spices and weird 'health' foods they don't have at the grocery store. The crockpot is only one part of long, tedious preparations that take hours and tie up every pan in the kitchen. I suppose those who cook as a hobby may get something out of this book, but I just wanted some simple keto recipes for a crockpot.
customer_reviews.author: Caradoc

customer_reviews.title: An ok cookbook, but tons of mistakes..
customer_reviews.text: It has some good recipes, but some of them don’t make sense.. such as this photo of the “vegan pumpkin curry" recipe. Pumpkin isn’t even an ingredient in the recipe... also add up the macros yourself- some of them are WAY off!
customer_reviews.author: Ketoandcorvids

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my hands down favorite cookbook for low carb and keto. It has amazing recipes, breaks down the macros, and it doesn't have any complicated ingredients. It also offers substitutes to make a recipe paleo.
customer_reviews.author: Pear

customer_reviews.title: Good low-carb slow cooker cookbook
customer_reviews.text: Looking forward to using this more in the winter. There's a nice assortment of recipes across all categories. One flaw I noticed is that recipes don't specify the size of the slow cooker needed. I have a unit with three interchangeable crocks (2, 4, & 6qt), so I'll need to experiment a bit.
customer_reviews.author: adrianne

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Food
customer_reviews.text: A friend shared some of the food he and his had cooked using this cookbook. If I can duplicate their efforts, its should be amazing. My friend commented on how easy the recipes were, and that they didn't take a lot of prep time (most of them). Can't wait to try it out myself-- as I am no Susie Homemaker!
customer_reviews.author: chocbunny

customer_reviews.title: If you have a sensitivity of allergy to coconut - ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have a sensitivity of allergy to coconut - Don't by this book. 99% of the recipes call for coconut oil, milk or water.
customer_reviews.author: BigRedCab

customer_reviews.title: Best keto slow cooker book
customer_reviews.text: This book is the bomb for keto dieters that are also busy or just lazy like myself. The food is delicious and the recipes are easy to follow. All the macros are included as well!
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I must admit the quality of this book is great, and I really like the way the macros are broken down. However, this book advertises itself as a paleo ( in addition to keto, low carb, high fat) book, but it frequently requests the use of dairy which is not paleo. One could say you could switch that item for dairy alternative like coconut milk, but you have to also mix addition ingredients it’s not a 1:1 swap. Otherwise I’d say it’s a good book if you can use all the recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Angela B.

customer_reviews.title: Great resource
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great resource as I make the transition into a healthy way of cooking and eating. Very easy to fool recipes.
customer_reviews.author: pwhitey

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great recipes that are made from scratch! Lots of spices/herbs involved which makes for great flavor without the calories. Most of the recipes don’t call for any out of the ordinary ingredients which is nice
customer_reviews.author: kebuck

customer_reviews.title: Lots of good recipes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my mother for a Christmas gift and she can not stop looking at it. I am happy she was pleased. It arrived on time for Christmas. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mysterious outlook

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome recipes
customer_reviews.text: Pretty awesome recipes. Finally some enjoyable Paleo recipies. Since my son easily lost 100lbs with the little to no carb diet, were all going paleo. And you have more nutritional energy.
customer_reviews.author: Austin M Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good book for crockpot
customer_reviews.text: Love this. African beef stew is awesome. You will love it. Filled with flavors. A keeper
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best cookbook I've bought in a long time. Try the chipotles meatballs!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: present
customer_reviews.text: my mom requested this as a present for her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes!
customer_reviews.text: Very great and healthy recipes! Lots of different kinds so there is variety and most of them don't require ingredients you'd never buy for anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far all the recipes are very good. Full of flavor! Yummy thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Spalmer

customer_reviews.title: Very good and filling
customer_reviews.text: Have tried many of these recipes. Very good and filling.
customer_reviews.author: Gippy1995

customer_reviews.title: Great Cookbook
customer_reviews.text: Tryed 5 recipes so far only one hasn't been wonderful and all were easy to perpare.
customer_reviews.author: bamboo brewer

customer_reviews.title: Simple
customer_reviews.text: Lots of recipes I grew up with. Lots of spices to enhance the Flavors. So easy to follow the recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel McElhannon

customer_reviews.title: easy to follow and good food
customer_reviews.text: I made several dishes in the week I have purchased this and found the instructions easy to follow and the food tastes good.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Fay

customer_reviews.title: She loved it. Low Carb cooking is the best
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. She loved it. Low Carb cooking is the best!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Fuller

customer_reviews.title: "easy"
customer_reviews.text: For me, not very "easy", I don't always have the ingredients the recipes call for. It just seems a little too complicated for a slowcooker where you normally just dump everything in.
customer_reviews.author: Br33zy

customer_reviews.title: Slow cooking fast eating!
customer_reviews.text: I love this book. Allows me to make dinners ahead and so far the reviews are rave!
customer_reviews.author: Khakijo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best keto recipe book I've purchased. I'd recommend to anyone seeking ideas and recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Stiff

customer_reviews.title: A little sad I bought this when you could probably google easier ...
customer_reviews.text: Expected there to be a lot less ingredients coming from a title "easy". I'd say the title is a bit misleading, but I will use a few recipes. A little sad I bought this when you could probably google easier recipes. Update: I returned the book easily. If you are not a seasoned cook, or do not have a lot of time for looking up strange ingredients, I would not buy this book.
customer_reviews.author: drgioia75

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful collection!
customer_reviews.text: I can't wait to try more of the recipes from this! All the ones I tried while reading it were absolutely delicious! I may work my way through the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Hyman, author

customer_reviews.title: Great cookbook, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't buy this book because of the only review was so negative. Glad I got it. It's wonderful. I love the fact it has the macronutrients listed completely, that's a must with me and the layout is fine too.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: I get the items from the easy to read recipes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the Mrs and I have been using it more than her. I get the items from the easy to read recipes. Mix, match, set, and leave. Great tasting food and the Mrs. is very happy for me cooking dinner on those evenings that I do.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Sublett

customer_reviews.title: Not so low carb.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately many of these recipes are not so low carb, containing beans etc. They also did not give the nutritional values.
customer_reviews.author: TJD

customer_reviews.title: use this weekly and I love the ease of the slow cooker
customer_reviews.text: use this weekly and I love the ease of the slow cooker. I have not had a recipe that I didn't like so far!
customer_reviews.author: brittiny m

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: the book is fine I just find it not to my taste of cooking
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: don't bother
customer_reviews.text: a lot of the recipes weren't what I would consider "low-carb" and the few I've tried were *meh*
customer_reviews.author: L. Wooldridge

customer_reviews.title: Looks great to me!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this and am reading it through, so haven't made any of the recipes yet. But I've bookmarked at least one out of every three recipes that sound so good I want to make them, and made out a grocery list to try my first recipe tomorrow. I find the recipes and descriptions very thorough and easy to follow. I'm not sure about following a ketogenic or Paleo diet in general (doesn't sound healthy), but just as recipes many of these make a lot of sense to me. And they sound delicious.
customer_reviews.author: McKenna Linn

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping that it wouldn't use artificial sweetners trying to stay away from the sweetners period.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... SATURATED FAT BUT SWTCH TO LEANER CUTS AND ITS GOOD TO GO
customer_reviews.text: HIGH IN SATURATED FAT BUT SWTCH TO LEANER CUTS AND ITS GOOD TO GO.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Mejia

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is a low carb book but the recipes are very high in calories. Not what you're looking for if you're trying to diet.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but not durable.
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with the quality as one sleeve unraveled and just keeps on unraveling as my tiny 4 pound dog wiggles out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes. Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: Great recipes. Quick and easy. I have a picky son and he has loved everything I have fixed from this cookbook.
customer_reviews.author: kdahy

customer_reviews.title: very good. LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I have already made one of the recipes in this book. It is very, very good. LOVE!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Schueller

product_meta.title: Easy Low Carb Slow Cooking: A Prep-and-Go Low Carb Cookbook for Ketogenic, Paleo, & High-Fat Diets
